entry.title: Combined summary - version::addr_recv/addrMe does what?
entry.summary: The person in this context is curious about a field whose purpose is unknown. The field is not currently being used and the person wonders if it can be safely ignored. Despite having no apparent use, someone has suggested that the field could be utilized with an IP lookup mechanism. This would allow for discovering one's own IP address, but there are concerns about potential abuse.It is unclear how this field relates to a clock, but there might be some similarities in functionality. However, the overall purpose of this field remains a mystery and its usefulness is uncertain. It may be worth investigating further to see if it can serve any purpose or if it can be safely removed without impacting other functions.
